channel.title: Rail way tram
channel.description: When I am moving in tam on max speed and I press 'S' to slow down, tam easly and smooth go slower (even speedometer slowly goes down). When I am moving in reverse gear and press 'W' to move forward the train suddenly goes forward, there is no animation. Somtimes it works.... sometimes not. Video [url='https://tinypic.com/player.php?v=t9gnki&s=6']https://tinypic.com/player.php?v=t9gnki&s=6[/url]

item.title: Rail way tram
item.dc:creator: mahalingam
item.description:
the tram has lost its function to move backwards right after a Bullsquid’s soul left its physical body here: bm_c2a2a at: -694 x, -200 y, 818 z
setpos -694.834534 -200.549118 818.752441;setang 22.594141 83.937004 0.000000
the same happens when I just pass the above mentioned creature without hitting it.

Read full topic

item.title: Rail way tram
item.dc:creator: mimol
item.description:
When I am moving in tam on max speed and I press ‘S’ to slow down, tam easly and smooth go slower (even speedometer slowly goes down). When I am moving in reverse gear and press ‘W’ to move forward the train suddenly goes forward, there is no animation.
Somtimes it works… sometimes not.
Video
https://tinypic.com/player.php?v=t9gnki&s=6

Read full topic
